thama iranama randa pawathinne oostreliyanu therim kamitu niladharin atha bawa loka kusalana tharagamalawe ardha awasan purwa wataye di indiyawa wethin parajayata pathwa tharagawaliyen iwathata wisi wu oostreliyanu pile nayaka riki pontin prakasha kele ya.1996 wasare loka kusalana tharagamalawe sita nokadawa 2007 wasare tharagamalawa wanathuru awasan maha tharagaya sandaha sudusukam laba ganimata samath wu oostreliyawa ardha awasan purwa watayen iwathata wisiwuye wasara 15kata pasuwa ya.pasugiya wasare engalanthayata alu banduna test tharagamalawa parajaya wimen pasuwa pontinge nayakathwayata dadi wiwechana ella wiya. 36 hawiridi pontin oostreliyanu puwathpathakata thiru lipiyak liyamin sandahan kele mewara tharagamalawa ohuge awasan loka kusalana tharagamalawa bawaya.
